root.name: Inevitable Outcome
root.description: Inevitable Outcome is a dual-stick survival gameÂ available on the Xbox Live Marketplace. Play cooperatively with up to four players and survive as many days as possible while defending yourselves against the attacking slugs! The game features day/night cycles where players need to use their head-light to spot the enemies in the dark. Players can pick up items, weapons and grenades and select a perks after each day to increase their chance of survival.
